Story: Welcome to the Sudbury Wolves,while you are here you can enjoy visting one of our many lakes, Science North or The Big Nickel
Welcome to the Owen Sound Attack, while you are here you can visit Harrison Park, the home of Billy Bishop or the Farmers Market
Welcome to Kingston, while you are here make sure to visit the Thousand Islands, Fort Henry or Dan Aykroyd's home
Welcome to Sarina, while you are here make sure to check out Canatara Park, walk on the Howard Watson trail or check out the Stones N Bones museum
Welcome to Flint, please be careful when you go outside, don't drink the water and make sure to eat a Coney Island hot dog!
Arena: Dort Federal Credit Union Event Center

Story: Welcome to Erie, while you are here make sure to check out Mill Street Mall, the Seaway Trails or Art Museum
Welcome to Peterborough, while you are here make sure to check out the Art Gallery of Peterborough, the Canadian Canoe Museum, or the Peterborough Lift Lock
Welcome to Barrie, while you are here make sure to check out the historic downtown waterfront, the Theatre by the Bay, or the MacLaren Art Centre
Welcome to Mississauga, while you are here make sure to check out Celebration Square, the Square One Shopping Centre, or spend some time cycling on the extensive bike paths
Welcome to Saginaw, while you are here make sure to check out the Temple Theatre, the authentic Japanese Tea House, or the Andersen Enrichment Center and Rose Gardens.
Welcome to Windsor, while you are here make sure to check out Caesars, the Windsor Sculpture Park, or Little Italy
Welcome to Sault Ste. Marie, while you are here make sure to check out the Canadian Bushplane Heritage Centre, the Canal, or take a boat tour of the Sault locks
Welcome to Hamilton, while you are here make sure to check out Dundurn Castle, the Royal Botanical Gardens, or the African Lion Safari Park
Welcome to Guelph, while you are here make sure to check out Old City Hall, McCrae House, or take in the trails at the University of Guelph Arboretum
Welcome to Ottawa, while you are here make sure to check out Parliament Hill, the ByWard Market, or stay at the Chateau Laurier
Welcome to Niagara, while you are here make sure to check out Niagara Falls, Queen Victoria Park, or Marineland
Welcome to Oshawa, while you are here make sure to check out the Canadian Automotive Museum, Lakeview Park, or the Robert McLaughlin Gallery
Welcome to Kitchener, while you are here make sure to check out Victoria Park, Rockway Gardens, or take in Oktoberfest
Welcome to North Bay, while you are here make sure to check out the Lake Nipissing shoreline, the Kinsmen Trail, or visit the marina
Welcome to Londeon, while you are here make sure to check out Rib Fest, the Westminster Ponds, or Fanshawe Pioneer Village
